name: Movie Dash
tagline: Going to the movies should be fun.
body:
### Movies Should Be Fun
Movie Dash is a simple web service that cuts out the hardest part about going to the movies. Don't worry about choosing which theater to go to, or working out when to leave the house. Just enter the time you want to take off, and Movie Dash will show you which movies are starting at the perfect time.

### Reliable, Modern Technology
Movie Dash is built on the MEAN stack--MongoDB, Express.js, Angular.js, and Node.js. This flexible Javascript-based technology suite powers Movie Dash and many of the most popular and powerful apps on the web.

### Authors and Contributors
Movie Dash is a collaboration between Kenneth Ho (@hokennethk), Jeremy Hu (@jeremyhu9), Kiyomi Li (@kshiraiw), and Alex Castle (@atcastle).


You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
